Procurement Manager Job at Cutstruct Technology Limited




        
    

        
        CutStruct is dedicated to revolutionizing the construction industry by offering innovative products and services that enhance efficiency, cost-effectiveness, and convenience in managing construction projects. Our flagship product, Livevend Bulk, is a digital platform that provides real-time prices and brand comparisons for construction materials, empowering effective decision-making. The platform facilitates secure online transactions between buyers and sellers, fostering transparency while offering additional features such as insurance, financing, and competitive pricing. We are committed to driving value and innovation in construction procurement processes.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Manager
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Lagos
Job Type: Full Time (Hybrid)

Role Description


	The Procurement Manager will oversee procurement processes to ensure effective management of construction materials and supplier contracts.
	Responsibilities include supplier evaluation, negotiating contracts, managing procurement activities, and analyzing market trends to secure competitive advantages.
	This is a full-time hybrid role based in Lagos, allowing flexibility for some remote work while requiring a presence on-site as needed.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, or a related field
	Experience in construction or supply chain management is a plus
	Strong skills in Supplier Evaluation and Procurement
	Experience in Contract Negotiation and Contract Management
	Highly developed Analytical Skills to evaluate data and market trends
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Proven ability to manage vendor relationships effectively
	Proficiency in procurement-related software and digital tools

Procurement Manager Job at KPMG




        
    

        
        KPMG is a global network of independent professional services firm with deep expertise in the provision of audit, tax and advisory services to clients in various industries and sectors of the economy. The Firm is well represented in Nigeria and across the African continent, with the objective of providing exceptional and quality services to multinational, regional and local clients and to enhance the product offerings in certain previously under-serviced markets.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Manager, Africa
Job Location: Lagos
Business Unit:  Africa COO Office
Reports to: COO

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Procurement Manager has direct oversight of the KPMG internal Procurement Team for Africa and is accountable for key objectives, targets and overall operating performance of procurement team members.
	The Procurement Manager will interact closely with the Africa and sub-regional Chief Financial Officers and other business stakeholders when setting budgets, formulating strategic direction and reporting on key performance areas. Furthermore, formulation and maintenance of procurement policy, procedures and processes will remain a key area of responsibility for this role.


Job Details


	Project Management experience.
	Advanced knowledge of Excel.
	Working knowledge of MS Office, Word.
	Advanced knowledge of Oracle ERP and Power BI reporting.
	Experience in a professional services firm preferable.


Requirements
Experience (minimum years of experience and in which fields, required to perform the job)


	Purchasing Experience, minimum 5+ years.
	Leading a team, 5+ years


Core competencies required for the job:


	Champion inclusion
	Advance on ethical environment
	Make sound decisions
	Demonstrate self-awareness
	Drive quality
	Apply a strategic perspective
	Foster innovation
	Build collaborative relationships
	Develop and motivate others
	Strong negotiation skills
	Strong organisation skills.


Benefits


	Setting strategic direction for the procurement function at KPMG.
	Prioritise cross-regional procurement and implement strategic sourcing initiatives.
	Oversight of contract management and related procurement activities.
	Monthly reporting on procurement activities including classification, vendor management etc.
	Business Lead for integrated finance IT modules aimed at centralised procurement across Africa.
	Clearly define the Procurement team's goals, objectives, and performance expectations.
	Develop a roadmap for a central Africa procurement function and assign tasks and responsibilities to team members ensuring that tasks are distributed fairly and that everyone understands their role in achieving the team's objectives
	Provide guidance, support, and coaching to team members to help them develop their skills and reach their full potential. Offer constructive feedback, conduct performance evaluations, and identify opportunities for professional growth.
	Risk management of all applicable P2P procurement activities.
	Achieving ISO compliance targets
	Responsible for Preferential Procurement element of the BEE scorecard
	Negotiating contracts and terms of agreement with suppliers and maintaining strong relationships with key suppliers
	Formulation and implementation of formal procurement policies, processes and procedures
	Responsible to maximise economies of scale and reduce total cost of ownership
	Oversight and collaboration of IT capital procurement, stationery and marketing spend.
